subject: Review of procurement procedure in all types of Consultancy Procurement.
text: HRdfy <cfv TTHrf yfadut TM Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ti 4Raa7, 78r 4ar7 &< TTGTr 471q4) 447 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 QA Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 HT National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 3f-5 % 6, #ar-10, ETraT, 7 faori-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAIICMC/IE/2011 November 03.2011 PQLCY CIRCULARIECHNCAL (No23/2011) Sub: Review of procurement procedure in all types of Consultancy Procurements. The procurement procedure for various consultancy services of NHAI has been reviewed in 85th meeting of the Authority and it has been decided that henceforth, the procurement of all consultancy services has to be done on least cost basis (Cost Based Selection approach) among the five qualifying Consultants, meeting non- conflict and other eligibility requirements, shortlisted after Technical Evaluation: Earlier process of Financial Evaluation and Combined (Technical and Financial) Evaluation for   selection of Consultants is therefore, dispensed with; This is for compliance by all Divisions of NHAI with immediate effect; This shall also apply where RFP has been invited but proposal is to be received, This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. (R.B.Sinha) General Manager (CMC) To AII Officers at HQIAII ROs/AII PIUs/AIl CMUs Copy for information to: PS to Chairman/PS to Members Librarian 'TU M NHAL top yet QokRo
